function: number of rolls in S:s to reach L:n {
    C: 0
    T: 0
    loop IDX over {1..#S} {
        if (T + (IDX@S)) < L {
            T: T+(IDX@S)
            C: C+1
        }
    }
    result: C
}

output [number of rolls in 4d6 to reach 10]

\\\ Result \\\

"output 1",2.3958333333337,0.7317414856708658,1,4
#,%
1,5.09259259259
2,59.9537037037
3,25.2314814815
4,9.72222222222
